mapper.insert: insert into thain_job_execution (flow_execution_id, job_id, status, logs, create_time, update_time) values (#{flowExecutionId}, #{jobId}, #{status}, #{logs}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update thain_job_execution set status = 4 where flow_execution_id = #{flowExecutionId} and status = 2
mapper.delete: delete from thain_job_execution where update_time < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(now()) - #{dataReserveDays} * 24 * 60 * 60)
